title: Greenland Crisis Has Danes Chuckling, in Their Own Way
summary_full: A little teasing has helped Danes manage their anger and anxiety over American threats to take a part of their territory. A Trump pincushion, anyone?
summary_public: A little teasing has helped Danes manage their anger and anxiety over American threats to take a part of their territory. A Trump pincushion, anyone?

GL.label: negative
